1597020.name: Shieldwall Chronicles: Realm of Madness
1597020.description:
This land will devour you...



Scribe your legend in Shieldwall Chronicles: Realm of Madness, a tactical turn-based RPG where strategy, bravery, and steel are the keys to surviving in the North. Brimming with demonic creatures and dark magic, you alone will shape the fate of the depraved land. Choose your path carefully, as your decisions will have everlasting ramifications throughout your campaign.

An Eclectic Hall of Heroes




Unite an ensemble of heroes for the horrors that lie ahead. Choose from over 15 character classes to build unique parties for any scenario, as each combination will have a different focus and tactical advantage. Mold each member of your party individually to fit your approach to battle with class-specific skill trees. As you discover magical items throughout your campaign, expand your strategic technique with entirely new and extraordinary abilities.

The Unforgivable Northlands




Carve your own path in an expansive, open world. Journey through the main quest, or strengthen your reputation with optional side quests offered by the land’s four factions. Elves, dwarves, orcs, or humans; who will earn your alignment? Your choices will be felt throughout the Northlands.

The Weight of War




Endure the consequences of battle with grounded tactics combat. The effects of morale, fatigue, and encumbrance will greatly shape the outcome of the onslaught. With a tremendous array of strategic enemies out for bloodshed, how will you claim victory over the darkness?
